TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content: Halfway mark to light green, just 39 till by 4th rep bar!
74 points until I get my last dark green bar.
Now down to **8 points** from my second green bar. I CAN TASTE IT!
Don't really know, but, at the moment, I don't really care! green bars are not everything!
I'm nearly halfway to my second one.

I have 96 points! so close. -squee-

If you are so inclined, some rep would be nice
I have no idea how this even works. I don't pursue rep bars at all. Lol.
Umm... Approx. 60 points for rep bar 2 (I think)

Just 14 rep left to go.

Now 5!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-08T22:59:06Z" title="08/08/2015 10:59  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 8, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**
Why does this thread exist? Or rather, how does this thread even exist?
At what amount of rep you get each bar?

> 
> At what amount of rep you get each bar?

Every 100 Rep you get a new bar.
Also, I need 2 more rep for 3 bars. 1 rep wouldn't hurt ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

48 rep.

> 
> Also, I need 2 more rep for 3 bars

There.

![irDZJLO.png](http://i.imgur.com/irDZJLO.png)

Is gud?

Gah, 49! I need one more to be able to sing "Livin' On A Prayer"!

No Rep Please, I'll earn it:)
At least 100, just reached 3 bars
I need 92 for 4 bars. Wow I'm growing fast for some reason. Did not expect to be at this point.
Just hit 90% Rep!!! That last point took forever!

As promised:D

Is it 900 for the next light green bar?

171 rep. A new user repped me, and now it's all uneven.

This makes me sad, as it will never be normal again
213 points as of now so 87. Getting repped 3 times by new users threatens my OCD
